title: Front basket
content: Give your E-Bike new charm and especially practicality. The strong and weatherproof front basket with its classy rattan look completes the image of a contemporary roadster. It holds around 12 litres and can carry up to 5 kg of weight.

warnings: Format mismatch: Missing card-info container, Missing "More Information" button
Minor format differences: Missing border-radius styling, Missing box-shadow styling
